name: Green is Better than Purple
description:
REQUIRES SOUND

Green is Better than Purple is my first LOVE 2D game! 

A simple point-and-click—yet music brings the experience together.

Controls

  • Left-click to start game
  • Right-click the target for points
    (2 points for green; 1 point for purple)

Created for Weekly Game Jam 137, this rhythmic clicker follows the theme "flop" with a sound effect and musical score that was discovered while searching "failure." 

The Failed Robbery score is composed by Soundroll.
